name: Stock Overflow
description:
Welcome to the year 2990!

It's your mission to make as much money before Y3K and everything resets. Invest in the stock market or build a private army, all in the name of capitalism!

Just watch out for any overflow or underflow errors...

Press a or d to navigate to the guide. (Forgot to mention that!)

Spoiler: Those bugs are deliberate, however the stocks itself are buggy, and the research feature wasn't finished in time :/ sorry. Enjoy!
